info.title: Data Modelling API
info.description: REST API for data modeling, schema management, and collaboration

post.summary: POST /ai/resolve-errors - Use AI to resolve import errors
POST /auth/exchange - Exchange a short-lived one-time code for JWT tokens (web flow).

400.description: Bad request - invalid or expired code

get.description: This handler supports both in-memory (file storage) and database-backed (PostgreSQL) sessions.

302.description: Redirect to frontend with auth code or error

get.summary: GET /auth/github/login - Initiate GitHub OAuth flow (web - direct redirect)

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: Optional redirect URI after OAuth completion

302.description: Redirect to GitHub OAuth authorization page

get.summary: GET /auth/github/login/desktop - Initiate GitHub OAuth flow for desktop apps

post.summary: POST /auth/logout - Logout and revoke session
post.description: Supports both in-memory and database-backed session revocation.

get.summary: GET /auth/poll/{state_id} - Poll for desktop auth completion

post.summary: POST /auth/refresh - Refresh access token using refresh token
post.description: Supports both in-memory and database-backed session validation.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or expired refresh token

post.summary: POST /auth/select-email - Select email for workspace creation

get.description: Supports both in-memory and database-backed session queries.

post.summary: POST /collaboration/sessions - Create a new collaboration session
POST /collaboration/sessions/{session_id}/invite - Invite a user to a session
POST /collaboration/sessions/{session_id}/requests - Request access
POST /collaboration/sessions/{session_id}/requests/{request_id} - Respond to request

get.summary: GET /export/drawio - Export model to DrawIO XML format

post.summary: POST /import/drawio - Import DrawIO XML file to restore layout

400.description: Bad request - invalid XML or missing file

post.summary: POST /git/clone - Clone a repository for a domain
POST /git/commit - Commit changes to Git repository

get.summary: GET /git/config - Get sync configuration for a domain

post.summary: POST /git/config - Update sync configuration for a domain

get.summary: GET /git/conflicts - List Git conflicts for a domain

post.summary: POST /git/conflicts/resolve - Resolve a Git conflict
POST /git/export - Export domain to Git repository
POST /git/init - Initialize a Git repository for a domain
POST /git/pull - Pull changes from remote repository
POST /git/push - Push changes to remote repository

get.summary: GET /git/status - Get Git status for a domain

post.summary: POST /import/avro - Import tables from AVRO schema file
POST /import/json-schema - Import tables from JSON Schema file
POST /import/odcl - Import tables from ODCS/ODCL file
post.description:
Supports:
- ODCS (Open Data Contract Standard) v3.1.0 (primary format)
- Legacy ODCL formats (deprecated, support ends 31/12/26)

Requires JWT authentication.

400.description: Bad request - invalid file or format

post.summary: POST /import/odcl/text - Import tables from ODCS/ODCL text
post.description:
Supports:
- ODCS (Open Data Contract Standard) v3.1.0 (primary format)
- Legacy ODCL formats (deprecated, support ends 31/12/26)

Requires JWT authentication.

400.description: Bad request - invalid content or format

post.summary: POST /import/protobuf - Import tables from Protobuf .proto file
POST /import/sql - Import tables from SQL file

400.description: Bad request - invalid file or SQL syntax

post.summary: POST /import/sql/text - Import tables from SQL text

get.summary: GET /export/all - Export model to all formats as ZIP

200.description: Model exported to all formats as ZIP

get.summary: GET /export/:format - Export model to specified format

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Export format: json_schema, avro, protobuf, sql, odcl, png

get.summary: GET /openapi.json - Serve the OpenAPI specification as JSON

post.summary: POST /workspace/create - Create or get workspace for user email and domain

400.description: Bad request - invalid email or domain

get.summary: GET /workspace/domains - List all domains for the authenticated user

post.summary: POST /workspace/domains - Create a new domain for the authenticated user

409.description: Conflict - new domain name already exists

delete.summary: DELETE /workspace/domains/:domain - Delete a domain for the authenticated user

get.description:
Returns all tables and relationships for the domain canvas, including:
- Owned tables (editable)
- Imported tables from other domains (read-only)
- Owned relationships (editable)
- Imported relationships (read-only, between imported tables from same source domain)

delete.summary: DELETE /workspace/domains/{domain}/cross-domain/relationships/{relationship_id} - Remove an imported relationship reference

404.description: Domain or relationship reference not found

post.summary: POST /workspace/domains/{domain}/cross-domain/sync - Sync imported relationships
post.description:
This automatically discovers and imports relationships from source domains
when both ends of the relationship are imported into this domain.

post.summary: POST /workspace/domains/{domain}/cross-domain/tables - Add a table from another domain

404.description: Domain or source table not found
Domain or table reference not found
Domain or table reference not found

get.summary: GET /workspace/domains/{domain}/relationships - Get all relationships in a domain

post.summary: POST /workspace/domains/{domain}/relationships - Create a new relationship

404.description: Domain or referenced tables not found

400.description: Bad request - invalid relationship ID or update data

get.summary: GET /workspace/domains/{domain}/tables - Get all tables in a domain

post.summary: POST /workspace/domains/{domain}/tables - Create a new table in a domain

400.description: Bad request - invalid table ID or update data

post.summary: POST /workspace/load-domain - Load a specific domain for the authenticated user
post.description: This endpoint forces a reload from disk to ensure latest data is loaded

get.summary: GET /workspace/profiles - List all profiles (email/domain combinations) for the authenticated user

source_optional.description:
Optional/Mandatory notation (Crow's Foot)
true = optional (circle), false/None = mandatory (line)
